name: unlock-screen
objective: user can disable the screen locking

steps.description: Click on user menu of the top menubar

steps.expected: the screen lock setting dialog window popup

steps.description: Toggle "Automatic screen lock" to OFF and close the window
steps.expected: The popup dialog disappears the "screen lock" button shows "Off"

steps.description: Return to the settings windows ("<" top left)
Select "1 minute" to the "Blank screen" option
steps.expected: Blank screen is now set to 1 minute
A neutral screen showing date and hour is displayed
The previous session is displayed without login password

author: jb

name: lock-screen
objective: user can enable the screen locking

steps.description: Click on user menu of the top menubar

steps.expected: the screen lock setting dialog window popup
The automatic screen lock is toggled ON

steps.description: Select for "Lock screen after blank for" a duration of "Screen Turns Off"
steps.expected: "Lock screen after blank for" is set to "Screen Turns Off"
The popup dialog disappears the "screen lock" button shows "On"

steps.description: Return to the settings windows ("<" top left)
Select "1 minute" to the "Blank screen" option
steps.expected: Blank screen is now set to 1 minute
A neutral screen showing date and hour is displayed
The login screen for the current session is shown

steps.description: Enter the session password and validate

author: jb
